Title: Relates to extending the number of days within a 12 month period a facility may receive reimbursement for a reserved bed
Summary: Extends the number of days within a twelve month period a facility may receive reimbursement for a reserved bed.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to extending the number of days within a twelve month period a facility may receive reimbursement for a reserved bed
